评论概述: Love the top but be sure to inspect it when you receive it - Mine had missing sequins
评论详情: Update:  I received my replacement and it looks good!GRACE KARIN Womens Sequin Tops 3/4 Sleeve Glitter Sparkly Party Blouse V-Neck Dressy Tops for Evening Party:  I've been shopping for a holiday top for December and just could not find anything l.ocally.  So I decided to try ordering  something from amazon.  I really did love this top, the style and fit.  However, there were sequins missing from the front of the shirt right around my belly button.  I would never have bought a top with this defect from a store so I returned it for an exact replacement.  I am hoping that the new item will not have the same flaw.  If so, I will update this review.  You can see the missing sequins in the middle of the 2nd photo.  It would not have been a big deal if it was on the back or side, but was very obvious on the front middle.
